alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 18 at 2:53PM EST until December 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Northwest wind gusts of 35 to 45 mph. Wind gusts decrease to 25 to 30 mph overnight. * WHERE...In Indiana, Elkhart and Eastern St. Joseph IN Counties. In Michigan, Cass MI, Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
